title: Terra Formars Gaiden: Asimov
original_name: テラフォーマーズ外伝 アシモフ
sinopse:
The manga focuses on the character Sylvester Asimov before departing for Mars, and tells a story not told in the main manga. The magazine teases, "before he departs for Mars, the mission he's entrusted with is...."

(Source: ANN)
